contest-event.event-date:
July 3, 2005 D Brighouse March & Hymn Tune
Brighouse March & Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest
brighouse-march-hymn-tune
Brighouse, West Yorkshire Best March: MARSDEN Best Hymn Tune: HEPWORTH Best Principal Cornet: MARSDEN (A Yamaha “Maestro” Cornet) Best Soprano Cornet: YORKSHIRE IMPERIAL Urquhart Travel (Roy Curran)(The Brian Evans Memorial Trophy) presented by Pam Lumb Best Soloist: HEPWORTH (Euphonium) Best Band on the March: PENNINE BRASS Deportment: THE LINDLEY BAND (Neil Jowett) Best 1st Section Band: MARSDEN Best 2nd Section Band: ELLAND SILVER (Morgan Griffiths) Best 3rd Section Band: HUDDERSFIELD BRASS (Allan Holdsworth) Best 4th Section Band: GAWTHORPE BRASS (Derek Hoyle) Best Youth Band: DOBCROSS YOUTH (Ted Griffiths) Best Soloist Youth: DOBCROSS (Cornet) Best Deportment Youth: BOARSHURST YOUTH (D.Redfearn)
* Tie breaker decided by the highest points “Band on the March” (Music) Hepworth 95 pts. Marsden 91pts
Dec. 11, 2011, 6:23 p.m. Sept. 9, 2015, 10:12 a.m.
